name: 楊任軒
objective:
本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論，技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.
